namespace.select:
select a.* from mobile_code as a
a.AggregateId = @AggregateId
a.Mobile = @Mobile
a.UsageType = @UsageType
a.UsageStatus= @UsageStatus
order by a.Id desc
namespace.update: update mobile_code set Version = Version +1, UsageStatus = @UsageStatus, EditDate = @EditDate, Editor = @Editor where AggregateId = @AggregateId and UsageStatus = 0 and ExpireTime > Getdate();
